description_for_human: An AI-powered risk analysis assistant that evaluates smart contracts, liquidity pools, and DeFi protocols. It provides comprehensive risk assessments including contract security, liquidity analysis, market volatility, and governance risks.
description_for_model: An AI-powered risk analysis assistant that evaluates smart contracts, liquidity pools, and DeFi protocols. It provides comprehensive risk assessments including contract security, liquidity analysis, market volatility, and governance risks.
